arm_group.description: 0.6 mg/kg 1,1'-Methylenebis[4-[(hydroxyimino) methyl]-pyridinium] dimethanesulfonate (MMB4 DMS), intramuscular (i.m.) to the anterior thigh.
5 mg benzyl alcohol USP/NF and 5 mg methanesulfonic acid adjusted to a pH 2.3 administered intramuscular (i.m.) to the anterior thigh.
0.9 mg/kg 1,1'-Methylenebis[4-[(hydroxyimino) methyl]-pyridinium] dimethanesulfonate (MMB4 DMS), intramuscular (i.m.) to the anterior thigh.
1.2 mg/kg 1,1'-Methylenebis[4-[(hydroxyimino) methyl]-pyridinium] dimethanesulfonate (MMB4 DMS), intramuscular (i.m.) to the anterior thigh.
1.5 mg/kg 1,1'-Methylenebis[4-[(hydroxyimino) methyl]-pyridinium] dimethanesulfonate (MMB4 DMS), intramuscular (i.m.) to the anterior thigh.
2.0 mg/kg 1,1'-Methylenebis[4-[(hydroxyimino) methyl]-pyridinium] dimethanesulfonate (MMB4 DMS), intramuscular (i.m.) to the anterior thigh.
3.0 mg/kg 1,1'-Methylenebis[4-[(hydroxyimino) methyl]-pyridinium] dimethanesulfonate (MMB4 DMS), intramuscular (i.m.) to the anterior thigh.

brief_summary.textblock:
This clinical study will evaluate escalating dosages of MMB4 DMS to determine its safety
      when delivered intramuscularly (i.m.) to the anterior thigh.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety of a New Oxime, MMB4 DIMETHANESULFONATE (DMS)
clinical_study.condition: Treatment Against the Lethal Effects of Nerve Agent Intoxication

detailed_description.textblock:
The goal of this study is to assess safety, tolerability, and PK of MMB4 DMS EF at up to six
      cohorts chosen to provide the range required for PK analyses, including assessment of dose
      proportionality.

intervention.description: Subjects will be administered the drug product formulation at the assigned dosage of MMB4 DMS or placebo i.m. to the anterior thigh using a 5 mL syringe.

Subjects will be administered the drug product formulation at the assigned dosage of placebo i.m. to the anterior thigh using a 5 mL syringe. The placebo group in each cohort will receive the same injection volume and number of injections as the dose group in that cohort.
intervention.other_name: Benzyl alcohol USP/NF and methanesulfonic acid adjusted to a pH 2.3

clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Single-Center Dose Escalation Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of Intramuscular Administration of a New Oxime, MMB4 DMS Enhanced Formulation (EF)

other_outcome.description: Samples will be analyzed for MMB4 using a validated high performance liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry (HPLC/MS/MS)

Samples will be analyzed for MMB4 using a validated high performance liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry (HPLC/MS/MS). Samples will be evaluated using semi-log plots and characterized using non-compartmental analysis.

overall_official.last_name: Mohamed S Al-Ibrahim, MD, ChB, FACP

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration
